featured.text: Why were scientists NOT concerned about space trash in the beginning? (A) It no longer served any useful purpose.
However, since it kept orbiting around the Earth without any consequences, scientists became increasingly comfortable abandoning things that no longer served any useful purpose in space.
England has a rainy climate, and umbrellas are very useful there.
Water is more useful to mankind than diamonds, and yet 26 are costlier.

definition.zh_def: 有用的，能夠提供幫助或好處的。
definition.en_def: Able to be of service or help; beneficial.
definition.example: This tool is very useful for fixing small appliances.
